architecture_description: Detailed description of how your AI system is built. Include information about the overall system design, how components interact, and the technical architecture.

integrations.name: Example API Integration
integrations.description: Description of what this integration does and why it's needed
integrations.interface_type: REST API / gRPC / WebSocket / Library / etc.

cybersecurity_overview: Description of cybersecurity measures implemented. Include authentication, authorization, encryption, network security, and other protective measures.
risk_overview: Summary of risk assessment and management process. Describe how risks were identified, evaluated, and mitigated.
development_overview: Description of the development process. Include information about version control, testing procedures, code review processes, and quality assurance measures.
model_version: Model version if using ML models (e.g., gpt-4, claude-3, etc.)
gpu_requirements: Optional / NVIDIA GPU with 8GB VRAM / Not required
network_requirements: HTTPS connectivity, outbound connections to API endpoints
data_overview: Description of data handling practices. Include information about data collection, processing, storage, retention, and deletion policies.
validation_data_source: Description of datasets used for validation and testing. Include source, size, and characteristics of validation data.
oversight_philosophy: Description of human oversight mechanisms. Explain how humans monitor, review, and can intervene in the system's operation.
